mapper.sql: select id, albumname, song, lyricist, songwriter, transcription, to_char(writerdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as writerdate, image, genre, mediatype, emailagree from albums
mapper.select: select * from checkes where module = #{module} and field = #{field} order by mykey asc
mapper.insert: insert into albums(id, albumname, song, lyricist, songwriter, transcription, writerdate, image, genre, mediatype, emailagree) values(seqalbum.nextval, #{albumname}, #{song}, #{lyricist}, #{songwriter}, #{transcription}, #{writerdate}, #{image}, #{genre}, #{mediatype}, #{emailagree})
